query.query: SELECT "%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%"."user", SUM("%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%"."added") FROM druid."%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%" GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2

description: regular datasource is lhs, broadcast join datasource is rhs

query.query: SELECT "%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%"."language" as l1, "%%REGULAR_DATASOURCE%%"."language" as l2, SUM("%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%"."sum_added"), SUM("%%REGULAR_DATASOURCE%%"."added") FROM druid."%%REGULAR_DATASOURCE%%" INNER JOIN druid."%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%" ON "%%REGULAR_DATASOURCE%%"."language" = "%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%"."language" GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 3 DESC
